definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
right in front of sb's eyes/right under sb's nose/current/at the moment
to have eyelids swollen from crying/very unhappy (idiom)
double eyelid/epicanthal fold of upper eyelid (characteristic of Asian people)
double eyelid/epicanthal fold of upper eyelid (characteristic of Asian people)

sentences.english: What happened to the 'drooping eyelids' and the wrinkle lines?
sentences.chinese: 那下垂的眼皮和沟纹哪里去了？

sentences.english: Chen made another breakthrough last year when he had a double-eyelid surgery.
sentences.chinese: 去年陈亦飞为寻求自我突破而做了双眼皮手术。

sentences.english: They were embezzling funds right under his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他们就在他眼皮子底下把公款贪污了。

sentences.english: My face is foul with weeping, and on my eyelids is the shadow of death;
sentences.chinese: 我的脸因哭泣发紫，在我的眼皮上有死荫。

sentences.english: Sleep tappeth on mine eye, and it turneth heavy.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠轻拍我的眼皮，眼皮便变得沉重。

sentences.english: Sleep tappeth on mine eye, and it turneth heavy.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠轻拍我的眼皮，眼皮便变得沉重。

sentences.english: How can the world shift beneath our feet?
sentences.chinese: 世界怎么就在我们的眼皮下改变了呢？

sentences.english: Several smaller glands in the lids make the oil and mucus layers.
sentences.chinese: 眼皮上的一些小腺形成了油层和粘液层。

sentences.english: Squeeze a bit of the ointment on your eyelid every night .
sentences.chinese: 每晚往眼皮内挤一点眼药膏。

sentences.english: This patient, who could barely keep her eyelids open, was diagnosed by her eye doctor.
sentences.chinese: 图上眼科医生诊断的这位病人，几乎不能把眼皮睁开。

sentences.english: Polly's eyelids flickered, then she slept.
sentences.chinese: 珀利的眼皮眨了眨，然后睡着了。

sentences.english: There is a generation, O how lofty are their eyes! and their eyelids are lifted up.
sentences.chinese: 有一宗人，眼目何其高傲，眼皮也是高举。

sentences.english: Broad disks of iridescent brightness swam under his lids.
sentences.chinese: 闪亮的彩色光团在他的眼皮底下浮游。

sentences.english: Most fish and snakes have no eyelids at all.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鱼及蛇根本没有眼皮。

sentences.english: Gravity is tugging on my eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 地心引力不懈地拖曳着我的眼皮。

sentences.english: Eyelid surgery was second most popular at 29 percent. A face shaped like a goose egg and double eyelids were favorite, it showed.
sentences.chinese: 鹅蛋脸和双眼皮最受青睐。

definition: outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
temple (on the sides of human head)
the wing of the nose/ala nasi
